title: SENIOR FRONT END DEVELOPER (ReactJs/ VueJs)
description:
•	Participate in software, eCommerce, web development projects for clients in UK, US, APAC 
•	Participating in e-commerce development projects using JavaScript, ReactJs/ VueJS
•	Carry out assigned tasks to meet all deadlines
•	Translate design or conceptualize into HTML/CSS 
•	Conduct ongoing research and then apply your best practices to web design, especially responsive design
•	Develop high level and/or detailed storyboards, mockups and prototypes to effectively express interaction and design ideas
requirements:
•	At least 3 years of working experience in web development
•	Strong experienced with e-commerce, HTML/CSS, HTML5,  ReactJs/ VueJs, JQuery 
•	Solid knowledge of JavaScript and can apply OOP practice with JavaScript
•	Good working experience with a framework or library like jQuery, Backbone, AngularJs.
•	Good experience in Js 
•	Strong experience with building responsive and cross-platform websites
•	Experience using a CSS preprocessor like SASS, LESS or Stylus
•	Experienced with Magento/WordPress/Drupal/Joomla and other CMS and e-commerce system
•	Language: English (level intermediate)
